pages.text: Stone tablets were written in the language of the ancients, little is known about this long-dead dialect and even fewer can decipher them. $(br) $(br) $(o)Perhaps studying them with your Sphere could help?
這些是最小的書面知識片段，通常是大表破碎成碎片的結果。
有一點碎裂，但大部分完好無損
The largest stone tablets - and the most rare of its kind.
